scripts.dev-generate-suppress-w: GENERATE_SW=true SUPPRESS_WARNING=true npx tailwindcss -i ./static/input.css -o ./static/output.css && vite dev
scripts.test-generate-sw: npm run build-generate-sw && GENERATE_SW=true vitest run && GENERATE_SW=true playwright test
scripts.test-generate-sw-node: npm run build-generate-sw-node && NODE_ADAPTER=true GENERATE_SW=true vitest run && NODE_ADAPTER=true GENERATE_SW=true playwright test
scripts.test-inject-manifest: npm run build-inject-manifest && vitest run && playwright test
scripts.test-inject-manifest-node: npm run build-inject-manifest-node && NODE_ADAPTER=true vitest run && NODE_ADAPTER=true playwright test
scripts.test: npm run test-generate-sw && npm run test-generate-sw-node && npm run test-inject-manifest && npm run test-inject-manifest-node
scripts.test:bdd: (pkill -f 'vite dev' || true) && (supabase status | grep 'supabase local development setup is running' || supabase start) && npm run dev & sleep 5 && cucumber-js --config cucumber.config.js --parallel 4 --retry 0 && pkill -f 'vite dev'
scripts.test:bdd-smoke: (pkill -f 'vite dev' || true) && (supabase status | grep 'supabase local development setup is running' || supabase start) && npm run dev & sleep 5 && cucumber-js --profile smoke --parallel 4 && pkill -f 'vite dev'
